ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... anyone ... I can t say for sure, haven t looked it up... it s probably for one of the cultural armors, or for a dye.  I have a blue diamond from Charasis,
ygData.messageBody:
> Hi,
> I looted a flawless aquamarine off the spiders in firona vi. Does
anyone
> know what this item is and what its for?

I can't say for sure, haven't looked it up... it's probably for one of the
cultural armors, or for a dye. I have a blue diamond from Charasis, which
is a component in Enchant Adamantite, which is a part of some cultural
armors I believe... it may also be useful for something else.. not sure

There's also the chance it is for a quest, as well... check the components
on our high level (and new) enchant spells, and on clerical imbues, to see
if that is listed in there.

JM - Saidan/Eltanin/Aipex Soulblade
37/53/12 Paladin/Enchanter/Bard
Ilsik Haucil

Mithaniel Marr
